title: A model municipal budget law.
author: National Municipal League. Committee on a Model Municipal Budget Law.

title: Indice de notarios de Lima y Callao, cuyos protocolos se hallan en el Archivo Nacional del Peru, siglos XVI, XVII, XVIII, XIX y XX.
author: Archivo Nacional del Perú.

title: al-Mughnī / taʼlīf Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Qudāmah ; ʻalá Mukhtaṣar Abī al-Qāsim ʻUmar ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Khiraqī ; wa-yalīhi, al-Sharḥ al-kabīr ʻalá matn al-maqnaʻ / taʼlīf Shams al-Dīn Abī al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥman ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻĀmal al-Zahid Abī ʻUmar Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Qudāmah al-Maqdisī, kilāhumā ʻalá madhhab Imām al-aʼimmah Abī ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥanbal al-Shībānī.
author: Ibn Qudāmah, Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad, 1147-1223.
